name: phonebook
description: a simple crud backend for the phonebook exercise (fullstack open course)

scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q build & mkdir build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && rmdir /s /q build & npm run build && xcopy .\build ..\..\part3\phonebook\build /e /s
scripts.build:full: npm run build:ui && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "uibuild" && git push origin main

author: vitorsneves
